[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@visualization-tools/core](./core.md) &gt; [IRenderer](./core.irenderer.md)

## IRenderer interface

Base wrapper for the underlying drawing technology, use to get specific drawing programs. Implementations provide hooks ([IRendererCallbacks](./core.irenderercallbacks.md)<!-- -->) on plot draw.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IRenderer<TEntityRenderer extends TUnknownEntityRenderer> 
```
